EmailTemplate.name: Sticker Requests
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We appreciate your interest in showing your YETI pride; however, we no longer offer free stickers. You can purchase the YETI sticker pack on our website. We also have high quality YETI decals available. Also, you'll receive a free sticker with the purchase of any Rambler or YETI Cooler.
Thank you,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
